page.title: Wal-Mart's Sept. Sales Up 2.3 Percent
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - Wal-Mart Stores Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=WMT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">WMT.N</A> on Saturday said sales at stores open at least a year rose 2.3 percent for September, near the low end of expectations, according to its preliminary tally.
